name: Smart Healthcare System
desc: Developed a mobile application titled 'Smart Healthcare System' for a Proof of Concept hosted by the college. Awarded 3rd prize for my contribution, along with a cash prize.

name: Supermarket MERN
desc: Full-Stack Supermarket application built using MERN stack, leveraging external APIs for ingredients and Clerk authentication, with data stored in MongoDB.

name: FarmerConnect MERN
desc: Full-Stack Farmer Management application built with the MERN stack, providing tools for crop planning, resource tracking, and market analysis to improve farming efficiency and profitability.

name: IoT-based Agricultural Monitoring & Alert System
desc: Real-time tracking of key agricultural parameters, optimizing resource usage, and boosting crop yields. Built with IoT sensors and data analysis techniques.

name: Digital Platform for Agro Center
desc: A digital platform for agro centers offering pesticides, fertilizers, animal feeds, and vegetable seeds.

name: Survey of Land Using Augmented Reality
desc: An application that allows surveyors to interact with spatial data in real-time using augmented reality for land surveying.
